widgets.label: Sync
widgets.onValue:
set ('colorC_var_*',"rgba(0,0,0,1)")
  send ('/live/track/start_listen/volume', '*')
  send ('/live/track/start_listen/send', '*')
  send ('/live/track/start_listen/color', '*')

  send ('/live/song/get/num_scenes')
  send ('/live/song/get/num_tracks')

widgets.onValue:
send ('/live/song/start_listen/current_song_time')
send ('/live/song/get/tempo')

widgets.onValue: set('plugins_modal', 1)

  send ('/live/track/start_listen/volume', '*')

widgets.label: Stop Feedback
widgets.onValue:
send ('/live/track/stop_listen/volume', '*')
  send ('/live/track/stop_listen/color', '*')
  send ('/live/track/stop_listen/name', '*')
  send ('/live/track/stop_listen/mute', '*')
  send ('/live/track/stop_listen/solo', '*')
  send ('/live/track/stop_listen/arm', '*')
  send ('/live/track/stop_listen/panning', '*')
  send ('/live/view/stop_listen/selected_track')
  send ('/live/song/stop_listen/tempo')
  send ('/live/song/stop_listen/signature_denominator')
  send ('/live/song/stop_listen/signature_numerator')
  send ('/live/song/stop_listen/is_playing')
  send ('/live/track/stop_listen/output_meter_level', '*')

var size=get('bank_size')
set('track_offset', get('track_offset')+size)
send('/live/track/start_listen/name','*')
send('/live/track/start_listen/volume','*')
send ('/live/track/start_listen/color', '*')

widgets.label: @{track_offset}
widgets.onValue:
set('track_offset',0)
send ('/live/track/start_listen/name', '*')
send('/live/track/start_listen/volume', '*')

widgets.html:
Ableton Live Configuration

- Minimum Version: 11

- AbletonOSC must be installed in Live ! -> (click here for more infos !)

- In Live's MIDI Preferences you must select AbletonOSC and also "Launchpad" as Control-Surfaces

- And set virtual MIDI-Ports for IN and OUT for the Launchpad

- Nothing should be set for the AbletonOSC !

- Default Ports are 11000 for Receiving and 11001 for Sending in Live and AbletonOSC !

--------------------------------------------------------------------------

Open Stage Control Configuration

- Minimum version: 1.18.0

- send: 127.0.0.1:11000

- custom-module: live-module.js

- css-file: live.css

widgets.label: ^angle-double-right Send
widgets.onValue:
var f = 1 + 2 + 16 + 16384

if (get("display_meters")) f += 128

if (get("display_transport")) f += 64

var args = [
  "/set_surface",
  get("bank_size"),
  get("trip_type_bitsum"),
  f,
  0,
  0,
  0,
  0
]

send.apply(null, args)

widgets.label: ^file-export Save
^file-import Load
widgets.onValue:
var v = storage.getItem("osc-ardour-6.config")
stateSet(v)

widgets.label: Row
widgets.onValue:
for (var i=0; i<8; i++){
send ('/live/scene/get/name',i)}

var lbl = {}
var off=get('offset_var_v')
lbl=get(this)
set('var_R0_@{parent.variables.n}',lbl[0+off])
set('var_R1_@{parent.variables.n}',lbl[1+off])
set('var_R2_@{parent.variables.n}',lbl[2+off])
set('var_R3_@{parent.variables.n}',lbl[3+off])
set('var_R4_@{parent.variables.n}',lbl[4+off])
set('var_R5_@{parent.variables.n}',lbl[5+off])
set('var_R6_@{parent.variables.n}',lbl[6+off])
set('var_R7_@{parent.variables.n}',lbl[7+off])

widgets.label: Sync Names
@{offset_var_h}
widgets.onValue:
set("offset_var_h",0)
send ('/live/track/start_listen/name', '*')

widgets.label: Sync All Names
@{offset_var_v}
Clear All Names

widgets.label: ^chevron-up
^chevron-down
^chevron-left
^chevron-right
^file-alt
widgets.onValue:
for (var n=1; n<8; n++){
set ('label_var'+n, '^play')}

widgets.label: ^user 1
^user 2
^sliders-h.rotate-90
widgets.onValue:
set ('label_var1', 'Volume')
set ('label_var2', 'Pan')
set ('label_var3', 'Send A')
set ('label_var4', 'Send B')
set ('label_var5', 'Stop')
set ('label_var6', 'On/Off')
set ('label_var7', 'Solo')
set ('label_var8', 'Rec')

widgets.label: ^sync
widgets.onValue:
for (var n=1; n<9; n++){
set ('label_var'+n, '^play')}

@{label_var2}

@{label_var8}

widgets.onValue: set('seltra_no',get('seltra_var')+1)

if (get('first_note')>=12){
set('first_note',get('first_note')-12)}

if (get('first_note')<96){
  set('first_note',get('first_note')+12)}
var sel= get(this)

if (get('key_numb')>24){
set('key_numb',get('key_numb')-12)}

if (get('key_numb')<49){
  set('key_numb',get('key_numb')+12)}

if (get('pad_note')>=12){
set('pad_note',get('pad_note')-12)}

if (get('pad_numb')>8){
set('pad_numb',get('pad_numb')-8)}

if (get('pad_numb')<64){
  set('pad_numb',get('pad_numb')+8)}
